front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technology--Telecommunications and Information Exchange Between Systems--Local and Metropolitan Networks--Specific Requirements--Part 11: Wireless LAN Medium Access Control (MAC) and Physical Layer (PHY) Specifications --Amendment 3: 3650-3700 MHz Operation in Usa (IEEE Draft Amendment to IEEE Std 802.11™-2007)"

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This document defines enhancements to the 802.11 PHY and MAC to support operation in the 3650-3700 MHz band in the United States of America.
